TextView.android:text: Respiratory rate (00.0 if refused)If the respiratory rate is 60 or more, count again and note the second respiratory rate
Sans lainay k raftar note karain Agar sans lainay k raftar 60 ya zayda ha tu aik daf phir note kar k likhain
Is respiratory rate on two different readings is 60 or above
Uper liya janay wali sans lainay k raftar 60 ya us sa zayda ha 2 dafa ma
Severe chest indrawing – Is chest indrawing on every breath?
Shadeed sinay k harkat andar k taraf jab bacha sans laita ha
Axillary temperature
\n Bagal ka temperature
System to open second reading if first reading is ≥ 38.0, after asking the mother to unwrap the baby if wrapped in the blanket or sheet and again note the second reading after 10 minutes

\n System dosri reading k option tak kholay ga jab pehli reading 38 ya us sa zayda ai gee, maa ko bolain k bachay ko agar kisi chaddar ya kambal ma lapaita howa ha tu wo utar dain and 10 mins k baad phir reading lain
\n OR \n

\n System dosri reading ka option tab kholay ga jab pehli reading 35.5 sa kaam ho gee, maa ko bolain k wo bachay ko dhood peelay, bachay k gilay kapray agar han tu wo utar day and bachay ko kisi chaddar ya kambal ma lapait day and 10 min baad reading lain

\n System dosri reading ka option tab kholay ga jab pehli reading 35.5 sa kaam ho gee, maa ko bolain k wo bachay ko dhood peelay, bachay k gilay kapray agar han tu wo utar day and bachay ko kisi chaddar ya kambal ma lapait day and 10 min baad reading lain
Is temperature on two different readings is equal or greater than 38.8
Upper li gay doun readings 38.8 ya us sa zayda han
Is temperature on two different readings is less than 35.5
Upper li gay doun readings 35.5 sa kaam han
Check the movement of the baby
Bachay ki harkat check karain

RadioButton.android:text: Movement only on stimulation (sirf chairnay par harkat ha)
No movement at all or unconscious (koi harkat nahi and bacha hosh ma nahi)
According to the family, the baby had convulsions since born(bachay ko jhatkay partay han)
The baby had convulsions in front or in the presence of health worker(Bachay ko jhatkay ain han team k mojodgi ma)

TextView.android:text: Ask the mother if the baby is having problem in taking milk?
Maa sa pochain k agar bachay ko maa ka dhood peenay ma koi masla tu darpaish nahi ho raha

RadioButton.android:text: Mother has told that the baby has difficulty in breastfeeding.\n (Maa na bataya k bachay ko dhood peenay ma masla ha)
No problem with breastfeeding (Maa ka dhood peenay ma koi masla nahi)
Baby unable to feed due to illness (Bacha beemari k waja sa dhood nahi pee sak raha)

TextView.android:text: Ask the mother to feed the baby now and you (health worker) will observe)
Maa ko bolain k wo bachay ko app ka samnay dhood pilai and nichay di gay bataoun ko note karain
Position (Bachay ko kis tarhan pakra)

RadioButton.android:text: Unable to feed due to illness(Bacha na beemari k waja sa dhood nahi peeya)

TextView.android:text: Attachment(Bacha ko kis tarha maa sa joray rakha)

RadioButton.android:text: Unable to feed due to illness(Bacha na beemari k waja sa dhood nahi peeya)

TextView.android:text: Sucking (Bachay na kis tarhan dhood liya)

RadioButton.android:text: Unable to feed due to illness(Bacha na beemari k waja sa dhood nahi peeya)

TextView.android:text: Feeding (Bacha na dhood sahi tarhan peeya)

RadioButton.android:text: Unable to feed due to illness(Bacha na beemari k waja sa dhood nahi peeya)

TextView.android:text: Is the position of breastfeeding corrected by research staff
Bacha k position kya team member na sahi k
Is attachment of breastfeeding is corrected by research staff
Bacha ko maa k saath joray rakha kya team member na sahi kiya
Does the baby find to have a poor sucking due to illness
Bachay k dhood peenay k salahiyat kaam ha beemarik waja sa
Is the baby unable to feed?
Bacha bilkul dhood nahi pee saka
Any pustules on the skin?
Bachay k jisam par kisi kisam k chalay ya phinsian han
Umbilical redness or discharge of pus?
Naaf ma soojan ya waha sa kisi cheez ka nikalna

RadioButton.android:text: Redness is present (Jaga par soojan ha)
Discharge of pus (Pus nikal rahi ha)

TextView.android:text: Jaundice
Peeliya / Yarkan
Did the health worker find any symptom, condition or problem in the baby?
\n Team member na in ma koi masla bachay ka noima kartay howa note kiya
1. Cough
1. Khansi
2. Cold/Flu/Runny nose
2. Nazla ya naak behna
3. Vomiting
3. ultian
4. Diarrhea
4. Dast
5. Oral thrush
5. Moun aur zeban par zakham hona
6. Irritability / excessive crying
6. Chichirahat ya bhoot zayda rona
7. Redness of eyes or discharge of water
7. ankhain laal hona ya ankhoun sa pani nikalna
8. Lips / tongue turning blue or blackish
8. Hount ya zeban neeli ya kali hona
9. Tips of finger/Feet turn blue
9. haatoun k unglian ya pair neelay hona
10. Some sounds present during respiration
10. sans laitay howy awaz nikalna
11. Bleeding from nose
11. Naak sa khoon ana
12. Pus in ear
12. Kaan sa pus ana
13. Chest congestion
13. seena jagra hona
14. Allergy / rash
14. jisam par laal nishan hona
15. Constipation
15. Qabz
16. Other (specify)
16. koi aur masla
According to the health worker, does the baby have any severe symptom for which immediate referral is needed or has been referred?
Team member k mutabiq bachay ko koi aisa masla ha jis k waja sa bachay ko foran tibbi maoinay k liya lay kar jana chahiya
Does the mother/family want a referral for their own satisfaction?
Bachay k maa apni tasali k liya khud lay kar jana chahti ha bachay ko
Did the health worker refer the baby based on the mother’s/ family’s concern or for her own satisfaction?
Team meber na bachay ko tibbi noimay k liya bhejwa diya
Did the parent/family of the baby accept the referral?
Bachay k ghar waloun na is ka qabool kar liya
if the parent/family did not accept the referral, revisit the next day and guide
Agar bachay k ghar waloun nahi maan rahay tu dobara un k ghar jain dosray din and un k mazeed rehnumai karain
Reason for refusing the referral?
\n Mana karnay ka reason kya tha
1. Did not think the baby was sick enough to need health care
1. Un k mutabiq bacha itna beemar nahi ha k us ko sehat k markaz jana paray
2. No one available to go with the caregiver
2. Koi moujod nahi ha jo bachay k saath ja sakay
3. Too much time from her regular duties
3. Masroofiyat k waja sa
4. Someone else has to decide
4. Koi aur is baat ka faisla karay ga
5. Too far to travel
5. Bhoot dur jana parta ha
6. No transportation available
6. Kisi gari ka bandobast nahi ha
7. Cost (transport, health care, other)
7. Paisoun ka masla ha
8. Not satisfied with the available health care
8. Maoujooda sehat k nizam tasali baksh nahi ha
9. Problem requires traditional care
9. Bachay ko jo masla ha wo riwayti tareeqay sa theek ho jay ga
10. Thought baby was too sick to travel
10. Bacha bhoot beemar ha and dur nahi ja sakta
11. Thought baby will die no matter what
11. Bacha akhir kar mar jay ga khuch bh ho jay
12. Other (specify)
12. Koi Or
Is this your first pregnancy?
kya yah apki pehli pregnancy hai
